title: Jodhpur: A Colorful City
short_description: If you are still fiddling with the thought of visiting the best tourist places in India in October
full_description: If you are still fiddling with the thought of visiting the best tourist places in India in October, Jodhpur is the answer. Number 3 on our list of most colorful places in India, it is a city that is characterized by museums, vibrant colors, traditions, weapons, paintings, and the never-ending history of the Rajputs. When in Jodhpur, take the desert safari and play by the sand dunes as you ride your favorite SUVs. The finely scattered sun rays playing along the contours of sand make a pleasant sight as you contain every bit your mesmerizing trip at one of the best places to visit in October in India.
